verses.roman: bhukti, siddhi, indriyārtha tāre nāhi bhāya

synonyms: bhukti—material enjoyment; siddhi—mystic power; indriya-artha—the objects of the senses; tāre—unto him; nāhi bhāya—do not appeal.
translation: "In the material field, people are interested in material enjoyment, mystic power and sense gratification. However, these things do not appeal to the devotee at all.
